title: Colloquialisms 2
sentences: Don't drive your parents crazy with this behavior!
I totally broke a sweat/got nervous because of the difficult questions.
Why are you ignoring me/looking through me like air?
This opportunity must not be missed/let slip away.
What a mess/shambles there is in this room!
Don't make faces, eat the pottage!
I'm a bit snowed under with work this week.
This thing really blew a fuse for him/her (made them very angry).
You're just messing with/pranking him, even though he's serious.
az élet neki az új városban.
Life really worked out for him/her in the new city.
Don't dwell/chew on this problem anymore!
This guy is very high-energy/fast-paced, he never gets tired.
He/she is totally out of the loop/lost it, doesn't know what's happening.
Now get lost/get out of here! (rude/forceful)
Don't be so cheeky/brazen with me!
This food is amazing/hits hard, I haven't eaten anything like this.
You're just talking nonsense, you don't even understand it.
You really misread/got this date wrong.
That joke was punchy/hit the mark!
He/she went ballistic/steamed up upon hearing the news.
This place is a total dump/shanty.
I'm just scraping by/idling my life away.
dictionary:
kiakaszt - to drive someone crazy / annoy intensely
leizzad - to break a sweat / get nervous
levegőnek néz - to ignore someone (look through them like air)
elszalaszt - to let slip / miss an opportunity
kupi - mess / shambles
pofákat vág - to make faces
elhavazva lenni - to be snowed under (with work)
kiveri a biztosítékot - to blow a fuse / outrage someone
szívat - to prank / mess with someone
bejön (az élet) - to work out / go well (life)
rágódik - to dwell on / brood over
pörgős - high-energy / fast-paced
kiesik a képből - to be out of the loop / lost
takarodik - to get lost / scram (harsh)
arcátlankodik - to be cheeky / brazen
odaver - to be amazing / impactful (slang)
süketel - to talk nonsense
benéz - to misread / mistake a situation
nyápic - wimp / sissy
ütős - punchy / effective
összejön - to work out / come together
feszegeti a határokat - to push the boundaries
begőzöl - to go ballistic / lose one's temper
putri - dump / hovel / shanty
tengeti az életét - to scrape by / idle away life
